name: Abstract Traffic
description:
What is it?

Abstract Traffic is a game (a little inspired with superhot style) about controling crazy the traffic on the small intersection. (in future there will be more maps). You can switch the traffic lights, force stop the cars, call the aliens to remove broken cars (what?) or call the cops to remove force stopped cars. try to keep the intersection fine as much as possible.

Cars AI

The cars have advanced AI, which not simply drive the car, but also allow to break the road rules to the car, so you need to be very careful, while watching.

Red cars

Beware of the red cars! they will immidiately explode when simply touch any other cars and make a very big damage to your intersection.

Can I slowdown the time?

Yes

Developer

Game made by Daniel Oschepkov.

Contact me on justdanieloschepkov@gmail.com

Game made with Unity
